ascend_skill.desc:
When dealing Fire damage to a foe with a skill, gain 1 Passion. Gain up to 4 stacks of Passion with 1 skill.
If Passion is at 4 or more stacks at the start of the user's turn, spend all Passion stacks to gain La Vie en Rose for 1 turn.
La Vie en Rose: Increase user's Attack by 30%/40%/50% (effect changes at level 1/50/70).
*Cannot gain La Vie en Rose consecutively on the user's next action.
ascend_skill.name: Passion

ascend_skill.desc: When La Vie en Rose is active, increase the party's Attack by 25% for 1 turn.
ascend_skill.name: Seguidilla

ascend_skill.desc: When La Vie en Rose ends, activate 2 follow-up attacks, dealing Fire damage equal to 66% of Ann's Attack to random foes.
ascend_skill.name: Marriage of Flames

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Falling Sun and Thief Tactics by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Beautiful Sins

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: When Ann uses a Highlight, increase her Attack by 100% for 1 turn.
ascend_skill.name: Hearts on Fire

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Crimson Rose and Trifire by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Makeup

ascend_skill.desc:
When attacking foes with Fire skills, 60% chance to gain 1 Passion stack.
When La Vie en Rose is active, increase Fire damage by 11% per Passion stack spent (up to 110%).
ascend_skill.name: Time for Punishment

highlight_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 195.2%/215.2%/207.2%/227.2% of Attack. Increase damage of Ann's Fire skills by 78.1%/86.1%/82.9%/90.9% for 1 turn.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 94.8%/104.5%/100.6%/110.3% of Attack, and increase Ann's Attack by 20% for 2 turns.
When Ann has La Vie en Rose, for 2 turns, decrease foes' Attack by 8% of Ann's Attack and increase her Attack by the same amount.
normal_skill.name: Crimson Rose

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 134.2%/148.0%/142.5%/156.2% of Attack, with 75% chance to inflict Burn.
When Ann has La Vie en Rose, and the foe's HP is below 50%, deal bonus damage equal to 30% of the damage dealt with this skill.
normal_skill.name: Trifire

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 96.3%/106.2%/102.3%/112.1% of Attack, with 30% chance to inflict Burn.
When Ann has La Vie en Rose, increase the damage dealt from skills by 30%.
normal_skill.name: Falling Sun

passive_skill.desc: Activate a Fire technical when using a skill or Highlight. When Fireburn activates, increase that skill or Highlight's damage by 30.0%.
passive_skill.name: Rising Tension

passive_skill.desc: When La Vie en Rose ends, restore HP to the ally with the lowest remaining HP by 45.0% of Ann's Attack.
passive_skill.name: Carrot and Stick
